abstract.shortdesc: If one or more of your controller nodes has experienced an issue, such as power loss or hardware failure, and you need to perform disaster recovery then we provide different scenarios and how to resolve them to get your cloud repaired.

section.p: If one or more of your controller nodes has experienced an issue, such as power loss or hardware failure, and you need to perform disaster recovery then we provide different scenarios and how to resolve them to get your cloud repaired.
section.note: You should have backed up /etc/group of the lifecycle manager manually after installation. While recovering a lifecycle manager node, manually copy the /etc/group file from a backup of the old lifecycle manager.
